forum-posts.title: Walsh Hall Closet Swap
forum-posts.description: My roommate and I are organizing a girls’ closet swap for anyone looking to get rid of old clothes and find new ones! In the Floor 3 lounge :) 4/12 @2pm

forum-posts.title: Thrift Shop Collections
forum-posts.description: Donate gently used clothing, and come shop April 23rd for new pieces. Collection boxes at Mac and Lower dining halls!

forum-posts.title: Eco Poetics Workshop
forum-posts.description: All writing levels welcome! To highlight the importance of poetry and its connection to sustainability and environmental issues. At the large tree in front of 245 Beacon!
